titleStmt.title: An ould facioned love. Or a loue of the ould facion. By I.T. gent
Amintæ gaudia. English. Selections
titleStmt.author: Watson, Thomas, 1557?-1592.
Trussel, John, fl. 1620-1642, attributed name.
I. T., gent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by P[eter] S[hort] for William Mattes, dwelling in fleetstrete at the signe of the hand and plough,

notesStmt.note: An extract, possibly translated by John Trussel, of: Watson, Thomas. Amintæ gaudia.
Includes, with caption title: The answer of Phillis to Amintas by the translator.
Some print show-through, and some papges marked; beginning-page 15 from the Trinity College (University of Cambridge) Library copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of the original in the Sion College. Library.
